title: 78/863/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 October 1978 on the adjustment of the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (France) (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 9 October 1978 on the adjustment of the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (France) (Only the French text is authentic) (78/863/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in France contained in the Annex to Directive 75/271/EEC is hereby amended as shown in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 October 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1.  (2) OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 33.  (3) OJ No L 108, 26.4.1976, p. 22.  (4) OJ No L 58, 3.3.1977, p. 22.  (5) OJ No L 3, 5.1.1977, p. 12.
ANNEX Supplement to Directives 75/271/EEC, 76/401/EEC and 77/178/EEC in accordance with Article 2 (3) of Directive 75/268/EEC of 28 April 1975
